options.name: Vampiric Thrall
options.description: You have vampirism and are the grunt to some Vampire Lord. You are considered permanently Charmed by them.

options.name: Anatomical Changes
options.description: Your vampirism has manifested in several changes to your physique. Gain +1 Acrobatics and +1 Strength.

options.name: Place of Rest
options.description: You designate a coffin or similar storage Object and fill it with dirt. When you complete a Full Rest within the Object, you recover all your Health and remove any Condition on you.

options.name: Wallclimb
options.description: You gain a Climbing Speed equal to your Movement Speed and climb vertical and horizontal surfaces.

options.name: Daywalker
options.description: The amount of Damage you take while ending your turn in sunlight is reduced to 1d4 True Damage.

options.name: Manifesting Vampirism
options.description: Your powers continue to manifest. You gain Echolocation up to 8 Units and become Immune to Disease and Poison.

options.name: Deadly Fangs
options.description: Your Vampire Bite Action deals an additional 1d10 Damage.

options.name: Action : Bat Swarm
options.description: You turn into a Swarm of Bats for up to 1 Hour, inheriting their Statblock. The Swarm only recovers Health at the end of a Full Rest and if it reaches 0, you cannot use this Action again until the swarm is restored. You revert back to your original form if the swarm reaches 0 Health or you use this Action again.

options.name: Free Action : Regeneration
options.description: After consuming blood from a Humanoid or Beast, either with the Vampire Bite Action or drinking from a container, you gain 2d4 Health. After using this ability, your blood requirements are no longer satisifed for the day.

options.name: Exotic Blood
options.description: Gain +1 Alchemy. Additionally, your blood counts as a Tier 1 Augmentation for Alchemy.

options.name: Vampire Charm
options.description: Gain +1 Persuasion. When a Humanoid Botches an Insight Check against your Persuasion, they become Charmed by you until it breaks naturally.

options.name: Ascension
options.description: You become freed from the grunt of your master and become a Vampire Lord. Your Bite Attack now functions to infect Humanoids with Vampirism if they fail a Resilience Check with your Level as the Required Check, turning them into your Thrall if they die within 1 Week of being bitten. You can maintain 1 Thrall, increasing to 2 at Level 11, and 3 at level 15.

options.name: Action : Vampire Bite
options.description: You make an Unarmed Attack against another Creature. If the Target is a Beast or Humanoid and the Damage is not completely Mitigated, you gain Health equal to the damage dealt and have your blood requirements satisifed.

options.name: Vampire
options.description: You are afflicted with Vampirism and suffer the benefits and weaknesses, changing from the Humanoid to Undead Creature Type. You have a -5 Divine Mitigation penalty and take 1d12 True Damage at the end of each turn while in Sunlight. You do not need to eat, drink or breathe and do not get the benefits from consuming foods or potions. For each day that you do not consume at least a vial of Blood, you gain 1 Tier of Exhaustion at the end of a Full Rest which cannot be mitigated by Spells or Immunities.
